backend/main.mo: Implements user profiles and privacy settings with access control, including auto-stop tracking and blocklist management.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature-to-file mapping evidence for the privacy dashboard, including tracker scanning, blocklist, logging, and backend integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all frontend files and their roles in the privacy dashboard.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring together header, protection status, scanner, blocklist, log, and profile setup UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to save their profile name with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/privacy/Blocklis: UI for viewing and editing a user’s custom blocklist, handling add/remove operations and displaying built‑in tracker counts.
frontend/src/components/privacy/Header.t: Renders the privacy dashboard header with branding, login state, and a disclaimer about non‑VPN functionality.
frontend/src/components/privacy/Protecti: Displays recent tracker scan logs with timestamps and provides a dialog to clear all entries.
Shows current protection state and allows toggling auto‑stop tracking, with authentication‑gated settings.
frontend/src/components/privacy/ScanResu: Presents scan results broken into trackers and clean domains with status badges and scrollable lists.
frontend/src/components/privacy/TrackerS: Allows single or multi‑domain scanning, classifies domains as trackers or clean, logs results, and shows scan output.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity auth, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useProtectionLog.ts: Manages a list of protection log entries with localStorage persistence, supporting adding and clearing entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, privacy settings, and blocklist data via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and defines light/dark theme color variables and utility classes for themed UI states.
frontend/src/lib/domainParsing.ts: Parses and validates domain input lines, normalizing them and returning structured results with error info.
frontend/src/lib/trackerBlocklist.ts: Contains built‑in tracker domains and utilities for normalizing domains, checking tracker matches, and combining blocklists.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a VPN-like privacy dashboard, its features, image requirements, and known architectural notes.
